page.title: 15Policing in Darwen
page.content: The{Police Station}is situated in the centre of Darwen.It is open 24 hours every day of the year. The{force}consists of: a Chief Inspector, an Inspector, 5 Sergeants, 40 P.C.s, 2 W.P.C.s, 4 CID officers, 4 drugs squad officers. Darwen is divided into 2{patrols, North and South; this area is North. A {car}patrols every part of the area daily and{foot patrols}take place regularly although, not every day. { Specials}tour the Hollins Grove and Birch Hall areas Friday and Saturday nights. On{Friday, July 10th}at 9.45am there were 9 men on duty. Two{panda cars were out on patrol. A{Land Rover}and{crime car}are also stationed in Darwen. All vehicles attend a robbery.
